Brix awoke, sprawled on bridge floor. When he opened his eyes, he saw 
that Fliq had gotten out of the chamber.

"Hey, you made it!"

"Yeah. Don't worry about what you did. It's okay."

"Thanks. I was really worried. But today we have a mission. We have 
to go to the Cybertronian Fire and get a space shuttle. That's what 
were going to use to go get the parts of the ship. If you could start 
working on this CR Chamber, I have to go find Spears."

Brix walks around the Ark for a few minutes until he found Spears.

"Spears, hey. Fliq and I are going to get the shuttle now. If you 
could do an appraisal on the Ark and make a list of what you need, we 
might be able to leave tomorrow. And better tell Striker to get 
troops. We don't know if their will be another attack."

Brix heads back to Fliq.

"So how you doin?"

"Got it up 3% power. I'll work more when we come back."

Fliq and Brix exit the Ark, turn on their jet packs and head for the 
CF.
